A

AbstractLightEnergyHub - Class in etithespirit.orimod.common.tile.light
A superclass representing all Light-based energy blocks that manage energy in some way, such as adding it, removing it, or both.
Hubs are a core component of assemblies which manage and optimize networks of Light equipment.
AbstractLightEnergyHub(BlockEntityType<?>, BlockPos, BlockState) - Constructor for class etithespirit.orimod.common.tile.light.AbstractLightEnergyHub
Create a new hub using no storage.
AbstractLightEnergyHub(BlockEntityType<?>, BlockPos, BlockState, PersistentLightEnergyStorage) - Constructor for class etithespirit.orimod.common.tile.light.AbstractLightEnergyHub
Create a new hub with the given storage.
AbstractLightEnergyLink - Class in etithespirit.orimod.common.tile.light
A counterpart to AbstractLightEnergyHub which represents a BlockEntity that links two or more AbstractLightEnergyHubs together.
